name: cfflush
description: Flushes currently available data to the client.

params.name: interval
params.description:
Flushes output each time this number of bytes becomes
 available. HTML headers, and data that is already
 available when the tag is executed, are omitted from the
 count.

examples.title: Simple Script Example
examples.description: Outputs 'foo' to the browser approximately 1 second before 'bar'

examples.title: Simple Tag Example
examples.description: Outputs 'foo' to the browser approximately 1 second before 'bar'
